paragraphs: This page consolidates all the work I produced for the Zero To Hero challenge. I gave my best buddy five thousand euros which heâ€™ll return to me after I successfully finished 180 days of daily music production. This page lists each individual track I created during the challenge.
This challenge runs in sync with my Master Diploma Electronic Music at the Point Blank Electronic Music School; which started on 17 July 2017.

These are the rules:
  • - make music daily for 180 days (6 x 30 days, about half a year)
  • - the absolute minimum is 2 bars of music
  • - I get 12 skip days (for emergencies; moves the finish date)
  • - every 30 tracks, my buddy will return a part of my invested capital
  • - from 17/07/2017 till 13/01/2018 (skip days excluded)
